location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Peter Elwin Wrench and Robert Garden, Agent and Council at Bussora [Basra], to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter reports the loss of a snow under Captain Phillips, a Company yacht, and the expected loss of the Fort William, all to the Chaub [Banu Kaâ€˜b]. It is requested that the Tartarbe sent to Basra from Bushire immediately, and that it give convoy to any vessels travelling to Basra.
